body:
Can I suggest that you report further problems via the golang-nuts mailing list. 



> On 16 Jun 2015, at 21:56, jakirkham <notifications@github.com> wrote:
> 
> Sure, I put it here ( https://gist.github.com/jakirkham/b57a2f20e54d3d7ffd1c ). However, I think that it was the gcc frontend that was causing this problem and just now I have gone through the build successfully by setting clang/clang++ in the environment variables CC and CXX. Though I'm guessing there is no C++ code involved here so latter is probably unnecessary.
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
